faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about My Chronicle

q1.question: Can I change plans at any time?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan whenever you want. Changes are reflected immediately and prorated based on your remaining billing cycle time.

q2.question: What happens to my stories if I cancel my subscription?
q2.answer: All your stories remain permanently saved in your personal library. With the free plan, you'll still have full access to all the chronicles you've created, only new interactions will be limited.

q3.question: Can I export my stories?
q3.answer: The Chronicler and Legend plans include export in PDF and EPUB formats. Your stories are professionally formatted as digital books with custom covers and elegant typography.

q4.question: How does image generation work?
q4.answer: The Legend plan includes AI image generation to illustrate key moments in your stories. You can generate illustrations of characters, scenarios, and epic scenes that integrate into your chronicle.

q5.question: Are stories completely private?
q5.answer: Yes, all your stories are 100% private by default. Only the Legend plan allows you to share public stories if you wish, but you always maintain full control over what to share.

q6.question: Do you offer student discounts?
q6.answer: Yes, we offer a 40% discount on Chronicler and Legend plans for verified students and educators. Contact us with your academic credentials for more information.
